00010 #include <qpainter.h>
00011 #include <qstyle.h>
00012 #include <qevent.h>
00013 #include "qwt_math.h"
00014 #include "qwt_polygon.h"
00015 #include "qwt_arrow_button.h"
00016 
00017 static const int MaxNum = 3;
00018 static const int Margin = 2;
00019 static const int Spacing = 1;
00020 
00021 class QwtArrowButton::PrivateData
00022 {
00023 public:
00024     int num;
00025     Qt::ArrowType arrowType;
00026 };
00027 
00028 
00029 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00030 #include <qstyleoption.h>
00031 static QStyleOptionButton styleOpt(const QwtArrowButton* btn)
00032 {
00033     QStyleOptionButton option;
00034     option.init(btn);
00035     option.features = QStyleOptionButton::None;
00036     if (btn->isFlat())
00037         option.features |= QStyleOptionButton::Flat;
00038     if (btn->menu())
00039         option.features |= QStyleOptionButton::HasMenu;
00040     if (btn->autoDefault() || btn->isDefault())
00041         option.features |= QStyleOptionButton::AutoDefaultButton;
00042     if (btn->isDefault())
00043         option.features |= QStyleOptionButton::DefaultButton;
00044     if (btn->isDown())
00045         option.state |= QStyle::State_Sunken;
00046     if (!btn->isFlat() && !btn->isDown())
00047         option.state |= QStyle::State_Raised;
00048 
00049     return option;
00050 }
00051 #endif
00052 
00058 QwtArrowButton::QwtArrowButton(int num, 
00059         Qt::ArrowType arrowType, QWidget *parent): 
00060     QPushButton(parent)
00061 {
00062     d_data = new PrivateData;
00063     d_data->num = qwtLim(num, 1, MaxNum);
00064     d_data->arrowType = arrowType;
00065 
00066     setAutoRepeat(true);
00067     setAutoDefault(false);
00068 
00069     switch(d_data->arrowType)
00070     {
00071         case Qt::LeftArrow:
00072         case Qt::RightArrow:
00073             setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Expanding, 
00074                 QSizePolicy::Fixed);
00075             break;
00076         default:
00077             setSizePolicy(QSizePolicy::Fixed, 
00078                 QSizePolicy::Expanding);
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 QwtArrowButton::~QwtArrowButton()
00083 {
00084     delete d_data;
00085     d_data = NULL;
00086 }
00087 
00091 Qt::ArrowType QwtArrowButton::arrowType() const 
00092 { 
00093     return d_data->arrowType; 
00094 }
00095 
00099 int QwtArrowButton::num() const 
00100 { 
00101     return d_data->num; 
00102 }
00103 
00107 QRect QwtArrowButton::labelRect() const
00108 {
00109     const int m = Margin;
00110 
00111     QRect r = rect();
00112     r.setRect(r.x() + m, r.y() + m, 
00113         r.width() - 2 * m, r.height() - 2 * m);
00114 
00115     if ( isDown() )
00116     {
00117         int ph, pv;
00118 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00119         ph = style().pixelMetric(
00120             QStyle::PM_ButtonShiftHorizontal, this);
00121         pv = style().pixelMetric(
00122             QStyle::PM_ButtonShiftVertical, this);
00123         r.moveBy(ph, pv);
00124 #else
00125         QStyleOptionButton option = styleOpt(this);
00126         ph = style()->pixelMetric(
00127             QStyle::PM_ButtonShiftHorizontal, &option, this);
00128         pv = style()->pixelMetric(
00129             QStyle::PM_ButtonShiftVertical, &option, this);
00130         r.translate(ph, pv);
00131 #endif
00132     }
00133 
00134     return r;
00135 }

00137 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00138 void QwtArrowButton::paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event)
00139 {
00140     QPushButton::paintEvent(event);
00141     QPainter painter(this);
00142     drawButtonLabel(&painter);
00143 }
00144 #endif
00145 
00150 void QwtArrowButton::drawButtonLabel(QPainter *p)
00151 {
00152     const bool isVertical = d_data->arrowType == Qt::UpArrow ||
00153         d_data->arrowType == Qt::DownArrow;
00154 
00155     const QRect r = labelRect();
00156     QSize boundingSize = labelRect().size();
00157     if ( isVertical )
00158         boundingSize.transpose();
00159         
00160     const int w = 
00161         (boundingSize.width() - (MaxNum - 1) * Spacing) / MaxNum;
00162 
00163     QSize arrow = arrowSize(Qt::RightArrow, 
00164         QSize(w, boundingSize.height()));
00165 
00166     if ( isVertical )
00167         arrow.transpose();
00168 
00169     QRect contentsSize; // aligned rect where to paint all arrows
00170     if ( d_data->arrowType == Qt::LeftArrow || d_data->arrowType == Qt::RightArrow )
00171     {
00172         contentsSize.setWidth(d_data->num * arrow.width() 
00173             + (d_data->num - 1) * Spacing);
00174         contentsSize.setHeight(arrow.height());
00175     }
00176     else
00177     {
00178         contentsSize.setWidth(arrow.width());
00179         contentsSize.setHeight(d_data->num * arrow.height() 
00180             + (d_data->num - 1) * Spacing);
00181     }
00182 
00183     QRect arrowRect(contentsSize);
00184     arrowRect.moveCenter(r.center());
00185     arrowRect.setSize(arrow);
00186 
00187     p->save();
00188     for (int i = 0; i < d_data->num; i++)
00189     {
00190         drawArrow(p, arrowRect, d_data->arrowType);
00191 
00192         int dx = 0;
00193         int dy = 0;
00194 
00195         if ( isVertical )
00196             dy = arrow.height() + Spacing;
00197         else
00198             dx = arrow.width() + Spacing;
00199 
00200 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00201         arrowRect.translate(dx, dy);
00202 #else
00203         arrowRect.moveBy(dx, dy);
00204 #endif
00205     }
00206     p->restore();
00207 
00208     if ( hasFocus() )
00209     {
00210 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00211         QStyleOptionFocusRect option;
00212         option.init(this);
00213         option.backgroundColor = palette().color(QPalette::Background);
00214 
00215         style()->drawPrimitive(QStyle::PE_FrameFocusRect, 
00216             &option, p, this);
00217 #else
00218         const QRect focusRect =  
00219             style().subRect(QStyle::SR_PushButtonFocusRect, this);
00220         style().drawPrimitive(QStyle::PE_FocusRect, p,
00221             focusRect, colorGroup());
00222 #endif
00223     }
00224 }
00225 
00233 void QwtArrowButton::drawArrow(QPainter *p, 
00234     const QRect &r, Qt::ArrowType arrowType) const 
00235 {
00236     QwtPolygon pa(3);
00237 
00238     switch(arrowType)
00239     {
00240         case Qt::UpArrow:
00241             pa.setPoint(0, r.bottomLeft());
00242             pa.setPoint(1, r.bottomRight());
00243             pa.setPoint(2, r.center().x(), r.top());
00244             break;
00245         case Qt::DownArrow:
00246             pa.setPoint(0, r.topLeft());
00247             pa.setPoint(1, r.topRight());
00248             pa.setPoint(2, r.center().x(), r.bottom());
00249             break;
00250         case Qt::RightArrow:
00251             pa.setPoint(0, r.topLeft());
00252             pa.setPoint(1, r.bottomLeft());
00253             pa.setPoint(2, r.right(), r.center().y());
00254             break;
00255         case Qt::LeftArrow:
00256             pa.setPoint(0, r.topRight());
00257             pa.setPoint(1, r.bottomRight());
00258             pa.setPoint(2, r.left(), r.center().y());
00259             break;
00260         default:
00261             break;
00262     }
00263 
00264     p->save();
00265 #if QT_VERSION < 0x040000
00266     p->setPen(colorGroup().buttonText());
00267     p->setBrush(colorGroup().brush(QColorGroup::ButtonText));
00268 #else
00269     p->setPen(palette().color(QPalette::ButtonText));
00270     p->setBrush(palette().brush(QPalette::ButtonText));
00271 #endif
00272     p->drawPolygon(pa);
00273     p->restore();
00274 }

00279 QSize QwtArrowButton::sizeHint() const
00280 {
00281     return minimumSizeHint();
00282 }
00283 
00287 QSize QwtArrowButton::minimumSizeHint() const
00288 {
00289     const QSize asz = arrowSize(Qt::RightArrow, QSize()); 
00290 
00291     QSize sz(
00292         2 * Margin + (MaxNum - 1) * Spacing + MaxNum * asz.width(),
00293         2 * Margin + asz.height()
00294     );
00295 
00296     if ( d_data->arrowType == Qt::UpArrow || d_data->arrowType == Qt::DownArrow )
00297         sz.transpose();
00298 
00299 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00300     QStyleOption styleOption;
00301     styleOption.init(this);
00302 
00303     sz = style()->sizeFromContents(QStyle::CT_PushButton, 
00304         &styleOption, sz, this);
00305 #else
00306     sz = style().sizeFromContents(QStyle::CT_PushButton, this, sz);
00307 #endif
00308 
00309     return sz;
00310 }
00311 
00319 QSize QwtArrowButton::arrowSize(Qt::ArrowType arrowType,
00320     const QSize &boundingSize) const
00321 {
00322     QSize bs = boundingSize;
00323     if ( arrowType == Qt::UpArrow || arrowType == Qt::DownArrow )
00324         bs.transpose();
00325         
00326     const int MinLen = 2;
00327     const QSize sz = bs.expandedTo(
00328         QSize(MinLen, 2 * MinLen - 1)); // minimum
00329 
00330     int w = sz.width();
00331     int h = 2 * w - 1;
00332 
00333     if ( h > sz.height() )
00334     {
00335         h = sz.height();
00336         w = (h + 1) / 2;
00337     }
00338 
00339     QSize arrSize(w, h);
00340     if ( arrowType == Qt::UpArrow || arrowType == Qt::DownArrow )
00341         arrSize.transpose();
00342 
00343     return arrSize;
00344 }
00345 
00349 void QwtArrowButton::keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent *e)
00350 {
00351     if ( e->isAutoRepeat() && e->key() == Qt::Key_Space )
00352         emit clicked();
00353 
00354     QPushButton::keyPressEvent(e);
00355 }
